title: Dashboard Dictionary for Causal outputs
description: The original JSON format for causal effects

raw_name.description: The list of user provided causal effect feature names.

name.description: The list of system generated causal effect feature names.

cat.description: The categorical value in the causal effect feature names.

type.description: The type (categorical/numerical) of the user provided causal effect feature names.

point.description: The point estimate value of the causal effect for the feature.

zstat.description: The z-stat value of the causal effect for the feature.

stderr.description: The stderr value of the causal effect for the feature.

ci_lower.description: The lower bound value of the causal effect for the feature.

ci_upper.description: The upper bound value of the causal effect for the feature.

p_value.description: The p-value of the causal effect for the feature.

causal_computation_type.description: The type of causal effect computation.

confounding_interval.description: The confounding interval of the causal effect computation.

view.description: The view (local/global) of the causal effects computation.

version.description: The schema version of the causal effect output.
